data.author: KristofWillen

changelog.release_notes:
- upgraded to latest SDK3 release
- hour accuracy readings should be way better now
- configurable hands colors for Pebble Time
- disabled invert option for Pebble OG, as current implementation is deprecated

Version 2.10:
- Better accuracy for hour hand
- Increased readability for Pebble Time users
- Reverted to previous hand form

Version 2.0 :
- Add option for Pebble OG/Steel to invert

Version 1.21 :
- Increase battery readout from 1h to every 10 minutes (usefull while charging watch)

Version 1.20
- Add date indicator
- Tweaks for more accurate time/battery readings
- Only check battery once per hour

Version 1.10 :
- better hour backplate
- better gauge dials for hour/min so it resembles more the Maxspeed watch
- minor enhancements to hour/am/fuel dials 
- tweaks for better placement of the hour dial 

The hour dial still needs further correction.

Version 1.2 :
- Fix an issue with AM/PM gauge

data.description: Watchface based on the Max Speed Speedometer watch.  Car gauges everywhere.  This watchfaces features 2 large gauges for hour and minutes, 2 smaller gauges for the AM/PM and battery indicators.

latest_release.release_notes:
- upgraded to latest SDK3 release
- hour accuracy readings should be way better now
- configurable hands colors for Pebble Time
- disabled invert option for Pebble OG, as current implementation is deprecated

data.title: Dashboard
